page.title: 02DAIRY FARMING DOWN THE VALE
page.content: The{dairy farm}has been down in the {Vale}for about{150}years. The owner of this farm is Mr.Stockton. Mr.Stockton works 15 hours a day from 4-00a.m. till 7-00p.m. Mr.Stockton works with 7 helpers. He says that if he didn't have this job he would like to be a butcher. When Mr.Stockton has milked his three different types cow all the milk goes into a cooler tank. The milk is then treated by taking all of the germs out. It is then put into bottles and{delivered to the public. The style of the farm has changed quite a lot, he used to have crops growing, chickens breading but all he has now is{many cows,}3 doves which live up in the attic and some bulls which live in the barn.
